name: Fateel فتيل | Escape from the building
name_original: Fateel فتيل | Escape from the building
description:
You wake up from a coma that lasted for an unknown period, to find yourself stuck in a pitch-black deserted basement, and you have to find a way to escape.

* Find a way out! *

Challenge your puzzle-solving abilities in a mysterious world full of challenges

Push boxes, carry bombs and take advantage of the environment around you to find out what happened to you

* Puzzles *

You have to escape from 12 rooms full of puzzles that require you to search to find tools that can be used

You have to take advantage of the main character's conversations and move between rooms to find a logical solution to get out

The difficulty of the puzzles increases as you play

Also, in the upcoming updates, more exciting challenges will be added

* Gameplay *

You will have a joystick visible on the screen to move the player and additional buttons to perform regardless of actions such as pushing boxes or carrying tools

You can change the size of the controls through the game settings

* Achievements *

It will be added in future updates

We are looking forward to hearing your opinions, help us develop FATEEL by sharing your suggestions.

We wish you an exciting journey

Team Evolite
